/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling construction site in the heart of Beijing, China. The scene is dominated by towering cranes and buildings under construction, their skeletal structures reaching towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The perspective of the image is from a street-level view, looking towards the construction site, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the structures. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the earthy tones of the construction site.
